text:
Across the different svn modules: chainsaw, log4j 1.2 branch, component, extras
and receivers, I count 101 references to '@since 1.3'.

Since we're obsoleting 1.3, we should update these - it's probably safe to
change all these references to 1.2.15 but I thought I'd file this bug to discuss
& track it.
creator: sdeboy@iname.com

text:
The only @since 1.3, I saw on the v1_2-branch was in LoggingEventTest and I don't think that any @since 
tags are needed on the tests.

For component, extras and receivers, I think you could pull all @since tags since the items will have 
existing from initial release of the companion.  Putting @since 1.2.15 in extras would be potentially 
confusing since extras could be used with many of the earlier log4j 1.2.x's.

If there are @since 1.3 in Chainsaw, then the could be changed to reflect the anticipate version number for 
Chainsaw.
creator: carnold@apache.org
